body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openmpi +lustre
```
doesn't produce a lustre-enabled romio, just an ompio (which isn't meant to be the default on lustre).
I'll supply a fix for the extra configure flag in a bit, but I don't see how to do it properly with +gpfs as the default.
title: Installation issue: openmpi doesn't configure lustre for romio
